title: Riven jungle
body: For {{champion:92}}  jungle is it good to get {{item:3714}} or {{item:3707}} because the red, marks them while mark, it gives vision and deals true damge on hit (which i think is good for her passive) and reduces their damge by 20% or shuld i take the blue one because it reduces their true damage and reduce their movement by 50%. Both red and blue all give 45 AD, 10% cooldown reduction and 10% armor penetration. So WHICH ONE DO I GET?

replies.body:
red smite would be stronger, since she has CC and gap closers enough to catch people.

blue smite STEALS 20% MS, so they lose 20% and you gain that. and deals true damage. overall its not as useful for someone with a lot of CC and gap closers. 

basically, red is good for dueling....riven snowballs from winning early duels...
the only other option is rangers (purple smite) since you want the sustain, since its one of rivens biggest issues.

On jungles that lack sustain I usually start off with Trailblazers then build the Brutalizer/Fiendish Codex etc, then I switch to the Red/Blue smite when I have enough to match the combine cost or when I feel I have enough sustain from items to make the change.

thats a recent change, to allow pleb junglers who really suck at the game to be able to use the sustain smite during the early game.

but yes, a good tip to newer junglers, so they dont keep rangers smite for whole games when they dont need it. (J4 uses it whole game because he doesnt build sustain and likes to be high mana and HP to be able to do anything in teamfights. and neither red or blue smite work well with him. since he has the CC so blue isnt as important and he doesnt NEED to duel, but his base stats are high enough that he can duel easily so barely needs red smite either. he lacks decent counterjungling, so white smite is weak. so end of the day, rangers/purple smite. is the best choice for him.)

blue works on everyone, red works on duelers who dont need a slow. purple works on some. and poachers is REALLY situational.

{{item:3706}} for the slow also it deals a small amount of true damage not reduces 
{{item:3715}} reduces smited targets damage by 20% and deals true damage per aa for 3 seconds
